daily_fact: Today in NYC: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: NYPD is increasing security ahead of protests marking the second anniversary of the Oct. 7 terror attacks, while the Secret Service claims to have disrupted a plot targeting NYC's telecommunications. Additionally, a high-rise partially collapsed without injuries, and a woman was killed in a separate incident involving an e-bike.
